title: Make one seemingly small change to the game that would create copious amounts of chaos in the game.
body:
I'll get us started: 

#There is no longer a CDR cap.

replies.body: Second Lee Sin Q places you behind the target, much like Warwick Q
It took a split second for me to realize just how terrifying that would be...
Armor items are actually useful
Ahri has... get this... EIGHT tails. All madness ensues.
The skies would fall, the seas would burn, the land would be swallowed up in darkness. Such is the cataclysm that would befall us.
Towers actually do damage.
More like *Tower damage scales better into lategame* but that's just my opinion
Lucian is white
{{champion:67}} I no longer smell black magic

The game obeys laws of physics.

ex. if {{champion:64}} kicks {{champion:111}} lee is the one knocked away and receives more damage than naut does. Or {{champion:51}} trap cannot snare {{champion:42}} cuz he's flying. Or if a melee {{champion:86}} uses Q but you move out of reach of his sword length before the swing drops the attack doesn't hit. The list could go on.
{{champion:136}} hits you with w and you die because he just hit you with a star.

{{champion:157}}:

* If he hits a regular Q (not the tornado), it's supposed to make you bleed over time because he stabs you.
* If he ults you, then every slash in the animation should deal damage and not just the slam on the ult.

{{champion:81}}:

* Every single spell will kill you on one hit because it's either magical or pure arcane energy that's coming from him.

{{champion:268}}:

* Every single attack from his soldiers will make you bleed because they technically stab you somewhere.
Mages autos scale 1:1 with ap.
{{champion:45}}.
Remove Veigar, I can't think of a smaller change

Going to suggest a few, aiming for the smallest changes I can.

--Auto-attacks no longer stop movement.
--Item "Unique" effects don't exist: all item effects stack.

And the big one...That seems small, but forever changes any lane dynamic and most trading situations in bot lane especially...

--Critical hits are predicted one attack ahead of time, and your champion glows (ala Lichbane or other on-hit effect) when your next hit will critically strike.
Does that mean that when Yasuo gets his PD/Shiv and IE, he'll glow all the time?
{{champion:420}} tentacles can crit now
You sicken me.
